description:
Prowlarr is an indexer manager/proxy built on the popular *arr .net/reactjs base stack to integrate with your various PVR apps.

Prowlarr supports management of both Torrent Trackers and Usenet Indexers.
It integrates seamlessly with Lidarr, Mylar3, Radarr, Readarr, and Sonarr offering complete management of your indexers with no per app Indexer setup required.
Changes:
- Bump webpack to 5.94.0 and regenerate yarn.lock
- Bump version to 1.24.3
- Automated API Docs update
- Guard against using invalid sort keys
- Add packages needed for RemoveDiacritics
- Fix description for API key as query parameter
- Fixed: Unable to login when instance name contained brackets
- New: Use instance name in forms authentication cookie name [ #2224 ]
- Bump version to 1.24.2
- Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
- New: (Gazelle/OPS/RED) Prevent downloads without FL tokens
- New: Sync seeding limits for LazyLibrarian (#2215)
- Fix weblate widget
- Bump version to 1.24.1
- Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
- Use error message from Nebulance response [ #2212 ]
- Display grabs, failures and queries stats with values
- Fixed: (MyAnonamouse) Avoid using FL wedges for freeleech torrents
- Fixed: (Gazelle) Allow freeleech torrents with Use Freeleech Tokens
- Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
- Bump version to 1.24.0
